name: Pims-look
body:
PIMS - The Jisc Programme Information Management System - exposes its most signifcant data through a RESTful API using the HTTP protocol for read (GET), write (POST) and update (PUT).  
Data read from PIMS is returned in XML format by default, but can also be retrieved in JSON format by appending "=json" to the end of each API call.  
This project aims to build a useful dashboard to enable Jisc Programme Managers and interested parties to track the state of play of their Programmes easily.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
